casebody.data:
No. 10-8322. William Leonard Pickard and Clyde Apperson, Petitioners v. United States. 562 U.S. 1242, 131 S. Ct. 1530,

179 L. Ed. 2d 346,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1126. February 22, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 396 Fed. Appx. 568.
